markdownRemark.html:
Hello, I am web & mobile developer based in Tbilisi, Georgia. I love photography, music and films.

Programing Skills: Back-end: Nodejs, PHP (Frameworks: Codeigniter, Laravel), Python (Django) Front-end: React (Redux), VueJS, AngularJS Mobile: React Native (Expo.io), Ionic Framweork Databases: MongoDB, PostgresSQL, Oracle, MySQL Cross-platform: Github Electron, Nw.js

Good knowledge of Nginx, Ubuntu servers

Also have experience with Socket.Io
